name: Speedy Cube
description:
For this game you require Determination, Hawk vision and.....speedy fingers. Sorry if this game makes you rage :D

This is my first game. At first it was really confusing but I got the hang of it eventually. I hope whoever plays this enjoys it. Also if a lot of people play this game then I will make more games in other genres such as FPS (First Person Shooters), 2d games, 3d games etc.
